node.title: Netherlands confirms 13 Omicron cases as new COVID variant continues to spread
node.alt: People wait in front of a desk at Schipol airport in Amsterdam marked "Appointment Desk" for COVID testing and quarantine.
node.description: Dutch authorities say investigations will continue after the new variant was detected in 13 out of 61 travellersÂ who tested positive for COVID-19 on flights from South Africa.
node.content:
["Dutch health authorities have confirmed that 13 cases of the new Omicron coronavirus variant have been found in the Netherlands among passengers that were on flights from South Africa.", "Testing was being carried out on 61 people who tested positive for COVID-19 after arriving on the last two flights to Amsterdam's Schiphol airport before a flight ban was put in place.", "The two flights were carrying about 600 passengers\u00a0and those who tested positive were immediately put into isolation.", "The National Institute for Health (RIVM) said in a statement that testing was continuing on the samples.", "\"The Omicron variant has so far been identified in 13 of the positive tests. The investigation has not yet been completed,\" the RIVM said.", "Worries over the variant come as many European countries are already grappling with a surge in coronavirus cases.", "\"It is not unlikely more [Omicron] cases will appear in the Netherlands,\" Dutch Health Minister Hugo de Jonge said at a press conference.", "
Countries brace for outbreaks\u00a0
", "The discovery of Omicron, dubbed a \"variant of concern\"\u00a0by the World Health Organization (WHO), has sparked worries around the world that it could resist vaccinations and prolong the nearly two-year COVID-19 pandemic.", "First discovered in South Africa, the variant has since been detected in Australia, Britain, Germany, Italy, Belgium, Botswana, Israel and Hong Kong.", "David Hui, a respiratory medicine expert and government adviser on the pandemic in Hong Kong, said that even though it is not clear if current coronavirus vaccines are effective against the new variant, the city's vaccination rate should be increased and booster doses should be implemented as soon as possible.", "He said that the two people who tested positive for the Omicron variant had received the Pfizer shot and exhibited very mild symptoms, such as a sore throat.", "Austria was also investigating a suspected case on Sunday and in France Health Minister Olivier Veran said the new variant was probably already circulating there.", "", "
Passengers are stranded in South Africa with flights being cancelled as the world again shuts borders.\u00a0
", "The United States'\u00a0top infectious diseases expert, Dr\u00a0Anthony Fauci, said he would not be surprised if the omicron variant was already in the US, too.\u00a0", "Although epidemiologists say travel curbs may be too late to stop Omicron from circulating, many countries \u2014 including Australia, the United States, Brazil, Canada, European Union nations, Australia, Japan, South Korea and Thailand \u2014 have announced travel bans or restrictions on southern Africa.", "More countries imposed such curbs on Sunday, including Indonesia and Saudi Arabia.", "In the most far-reaching effort to keep the variant at bay, Israel announced\u00a0late on Saturday it would ban the entry of all foreigners and reintroduce counter-terrorism phone-tracking technology to contain the spread of the variant.", "", "
What COVID-19 travel insurance doesn't cover you for(Emilia Terzon)
", "Wires/ABC"]
